name: Bunker 48
description:
This is my first attempt at making a game. Obviously it's not going to be a good game, but I have to start from somewhere.

If you do decide to download the game, please leave some feedback on what you thought. Whether it's constructive criticism or word vomit I'm interested in what you think. I plan on adding to this game as I learn new things about game development and the Unity Engine.

One of the first things I'd like to add is some kind of instructions. I'm thinking about either doing a pre-mission briefing or have a character give you instructions as you go.  I'm also learning how to use Blender, and will be looking at MagicaVoxel soon. Hopefully I can make some more interesting objects for the scenery. As for the audio, I will probably have to look at the Assets Store for that. Audio is not in my current capability to learn.

Leave me some feedback
-Korvette88
